name: Rat Race
overview: A German language joystick waggler with a track and field theme. Apparently, it was developed by a teacher at a centre for computer courses. Players select from a roster of three rats, then they are off to the stadium. The race lasts for a couple of seconds. Depending on the score, players may be able to enter their initials on the high score table. Afterwards, the game returns to the title screen.
